errors.error_description: The installation steps are in the wrong logical order. The package is installed globally with pip before the virtual environment is created and activated, defeating the purpose of the venv.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip3 install` command to be after the `source venv/bin/activate` command.
Remove the virtual environment creation steps (`python3 -m venv venv` and `source venv/bin/activate`).
Change the installation to `python3 -m pip install androidviewclient --upgrade` and place it after activating the venv.
Combine all commands into a single line: `python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip3 install androidviewclient --upgrade`.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `pip3 install` command to be after the `source venv/bin/activate` command.
